detail_desc: Knee-length coat in soft, heavily draping faux fur with notch lapels and concealed hook-and-eye fasteners at the front and discreet side pockets. Dropped shoulders and long, wide sleeves. Lined.
Ankle-length trousers in a sequin-embroidered weave with a regular waist, concealed zip in one side and straight, wide legs. Partly lined.
Knee-length shorts in cotton corduroy with a zip fly and button, side pockets and welt back pockets.
Jumper knitted in soft cotton with a lined drawstring hood, button placket, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
A-line dress in soft fabric with a press-stud on one shoulder and long sleeves.
Short dungaree dress in cotton with a zip down the front, adjustable straps with metal fasteners, and patch front pockets.

Set with a jacket and trousers in soft thermal fleece. Jacket with a stand-up collar, zip down the front with a chin guard, raglan sleeves and a contrasting colour trim at the cuffs and hem. Trousers with covered elastication at the waist. The polyester content of the set is recycled.
Fully lined bikini top with laser-cut scalloped edges. Underwired, moulded, padded cups that lift and shape, ties at the back of the neck and an adjustable metal fastener at the back.
Fine-knit trainer socks in fast-drying functional fabric.

Short dress in woven fabric containing glittery threads with a round, frill-trimmed neckline and small opening with ties at the front. Short sleeves with elasticated frill trims, a smocked seam at the waist and a frill-trimmed seam and flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Round-necked T-shirt in sturdy cotton jersey.
Fitted, off-the-shoulder top in smocked cotton jersey with short sleeves. Small, overlocked frill trim at the top and around the sleeves and hem.
Short, high-waisted, pleated skirt in woven fabric with a press-stud and concealed zip at one side. Unlined.
Knee-length dress in a patterned weave with a V-neck and short cap sleeves. Detachable tie belt at the waist and a rounded hem with slits in the sides. Unlined.
T-shirt in cotton jersey.
Flip-flops with rubber straps and fluted soles.
Fitted top in soft cotton jersey with a boat neck and 3/4-length sleeves.

Classic oversized shirt in a crisp cotton weave with a collar, concealed buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back for added width. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Jumper in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with dropped shoulders, long, embroidered sleeves, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Waist bag in fabric with a mesh back, zip at the top, zipped outer compartment and an adjustable strap with a plastic fastener. Two mesh inner compartments. Lined. Size 8x15x30 cm.
Baby Exclusive. Jumper in a soft, textured organic cotton knit with buttons at the back and long raglan sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Straight-cut, double-breasted jacket in twill made from a linen and cotton blend with notch lapels, buttons at the cuffs and pockets in the side seams. Unlined.
Straight-cut T-shirt in soft, airy jersey made from a silk and cotton blend with a round neck.
Belt with a metal buckle. Width approx. 2.5 cm.

Short, off-the-shoulder top in crinkled jersey with smocking at the top and hem, and long balloon sleeves with narrow, covered elastication at the cuffs. The polyester content of the top is partly recycled.

Chinos in extra-stretchy cotton twill with a zip fly, side pockets, a coin pocket and welt back pockets with a button. Slim Fit – a fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.
Jumpsuit in woven fabric with a V-neck, short butterfly sleeves, and a concealed zip at the back. Seam at the waist, and slightly slimmer, gently flared legs with creases.
Vest top in soft slub jersey with a draped front, deep armholes and racer back.
Top in soft pile with an embroidered motif on the front, stand up collar, zip at the top and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
V-neck top in soft pointelle jersey with narrow shoulder straps.
Loafers in imitation leather with a decorative seam at the front and metal buckle at the top. Satin linings and imitation leather insoles. Heel approx. 1.8 cm.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets and flap leg pockets.

Fully lined, patterned swimsuit with a deep V-neck and padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Adjustable shoulder straps and decorative crossover straps at the front and sides. Medium coverage at the back.

Baby Exclusive. Long-sleeved all-in-one-suit in soft, organic cotton slub jersey with a button placket and open chest pocket. Concealed press-studs at the crotch and down the legs, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hems.

Shirt in stretch denim with a detachable hood in sweatshirt fabric. The shirt is in a straight style with a collar, press-studs down the front, two chest pockets, one with a flap and press stud, and cuffs with a press-stud fastening.
Boxer shorts in cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Short dress in chiffon with a V-neck, seam with a small frill trim below the bust, and long sleeves with narrow elastication and a small frill at the cuffs. A-line cut to the hem. Jersey lining.
Short, gently fitted dungaree dress in stretch denim with buttons down the front, wide, adjustable shoulder straps and a seam at the waist with patch pockets. Unlined.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Regular fit.
Boxy top in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves with ribbed cuffs, and a raw-edge, cut-off hem. Soft brushed inside.
Imitation suede desert boots with lacing at the front and a welt seam around the soles. Twill linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel 2.5 cm.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, sturdy cotton denim with a high waist, button fly and slim, straight legs with raw-edge hems.
Boys’ briefs in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and lined front.

Super push-up bralette in lace and mesh with underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a wide lace trim at the hem and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
STUDIO COLLECTION. Skirt in soft, supple leather with contrasting colour seams, a high waist with pleats at the top and a concealed zip at the back. Short underskirt.
Garter-stitched jumper in a soft knit with gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves and roll edges around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Sleeveless, calf-length dress in a soft, ribbed viscose blend with a slightly deeper neckline at the front.
Shorts in cotton twill with a drawstring at the waist, fake fly and side pockets.
Long-sleeved cardigan in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a washed look, with a stand-up collar and diagonal zip down the front.
Hat in felted wool with a band. Width of brim 6 cm.
Lightweight, padded jacket in a quilted weave with a detachable hood, zip down the front with a chin guard, and side pockets. Narrow elastication around the hood, cuffs and hem.
Short swim shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist and rounded hems. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Short, off-the-shoulder, fitted dress in a smocked weave with short, frill-trimmed sleeves and a frill trim at the top and hem.
Sleeveless dress in organic cotton jersey with a smocked seam at the waist and rounded hem.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in cotton piqué with a collar, button placket and small embroidery detail on the chest. Straight-cut hem with short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Shorter jumper in a rib knit with a deep V-neck and draped knot detail at the front, low dropped shoulders and long sleeves.

Soft, non-wired bras in organic cotton jersey with lightly padded, triangular cups that give the bust a natural shape and light support. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Long-sleeved top in soft, printed cotton jersey. Round neckline with a narrow, ribbed trim, and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Long-sleeved dress in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a flounced trim at the top and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Unlined.
Straight T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with an interactive motif on the front. Round neck with narrow ribbing around the neckline.
Long 5-pocket shorts in cotton twill with a regular waist and slightly lower crotch.
Short, fitted T-shirt in ribbed jersey made from recycled polyester. Round neckline with a narrow trim.
Treggings in washed stretch twill with an elasticated waist, fake fly and fake front pockets.
Cropped, fitted top in cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps.
T-shirt in soft jersey with a round neck, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem.

Knee-length dress in jersey crêpe with a V-neck and sewn-in wrapover at the top. Seam with a sewn-in tie belt at the waist, long, slightly wider cuffed sleeves and a flared skirt. Lined at the front of the bodice.

V-neck blouse in a lightly crêped viscose weave with buttons down the front, a yoke and gentle gathers at the shoulders. Long sleeves with gathered cuffs and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Wide shirt in a soft weave with a collar, button placket, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and buttoned cuffs. Yoke with a pleat at the back, and a rounded hem with slits in the sides. Longer at the back.
Cold-shoulder jumper in a soft rib knit with long sleeves.
Loose-fitting, V-neck T-shirt in soft jersey made from a cotton blend.
T-shirt in soft, organic cotton slub jersey. Short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Long-sleeved tops in soft, organic cotton jersey, one with an all-over print.

STUDIO COLLECTION. Short dress in sturdy cotton jersey in a boxy fit with seam details at the top, dropped shoulders and short sleeves. Narrow, elasticated seam at the waist, sewn-on gently draped panels that create a wrapover, and a straight-cut skirt. Unlined.
Wide, cropped T-shirt in cotton jersey with a motif.
Fitted, turtleneck top in mesh with long sleeves. Unlined.
Top in soft, printed jersey with a narrow trim around the neckline, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Dress in lightweight, patterned sweatshirt fabric with short raglan sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, a detachable, braided belt at the waist, and a rounded hem.
Long-sleeved dress in a jacquard knit with a fastening at the back, seam at the hem and glittery tulle skirt. Partly lined.
3/4-length leggings in soft, organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
5-pocket, low-rise jeans in washed, superstretch denim with a zip fly and button, and super-skinny legs.
